edu.arizona.ece.memsim.model

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.arizona.ece.memsim.model.Memory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheCallBack, WriteInvalidateListener

    public class Memory
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheCallBack, WriteInvalidateListener
    Models the Main System Memory of a Computer
    Author:
    Mike Harmon (mpharmon@email.arizona.edu)

      • Memory

        public Memory(java.lang.Integer tSize,
              java.lang.Integer bSize,
              java.lang.Integer aTime)
        Creates a Memory Representation
        Parameters:
        tSize - Total Size of Memory (in Bytes)
        bSize - Block Size (in Bytes)
        aTime - Access Time (in clock cycle)
